results.title: Ivabradine: new drug. Best avoided in stable angina.
results.text_hl: It was approved for sale in Europe through the centralised procedure for second-line treatment of @DISEASE_Angina_Stable @DISEASE_MESH:D060050 @@@stable angina@@@. (3) Clinical evaluation of @CHEMICAL_Ivabradine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077550 @@@ivabradine@@@ only includes randomised controlled trials versus two other anti-@<m>DISEASE_Ototoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081015 @@@angina drugs@@@: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.

citations.NLM: Ivabradine: new drug. Best avoided in stable angina. Prescrire Int. 2007 Apr;16(88):53-6. PMID: 17458043

results.title: Amiodarone protects cardiac myocytes against oxidative injury by its free radical scavenging action.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Amiodarone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000638 @@@Amiodarone@@@ decreased the intensity of the DMPO-OH signals in a dose-dependent manner (0.1 to 100 micromol/L), whereas other @<m>DISEASE_Ototoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081015 @@@antiarrhythmia drugs@@@ such as @CHEMICAL_Disopyramide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004206 @@@disopyramide@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ had no such effects.

citations.NLM: Ide T, Tsutsui H, Kinugawa S, Utsumi H, Takeshita A. Amiodarone protects cardiac myocytes against oxidative injury by its free radical scavenging action. Circulation. 1999 Aug 17;100(7):690-2. PMID: 10449688
citations.BibTeX: @article{10449688, title={Amiodarone protects cardiac myocytes against oxidative injury by its free radical scavenging action.}, author={Ide T and Tsutsui H and Kinugawa S and Utsumi H and Takeshita A}, journal={Circulation}, volume={100}, number={7}, pages={690-2}}
